title: "Excellent Pole"
---

This pole measures exactly 0.65 cm in diameter and 5 cm in length. The diameter is chosen to give a 0.2 mm clearance on either side between the pole and the corresponding hole in the [excellent rectangle](Excellent_rectangle.qmd).
